attributes.action: Cause immigration staff to greet British passport holders with 'welcome home' greeting
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As part of his drive towards identifying Britishness will the PM cause immigration staff at airports, ports etc. to demonstrate their shared British nationality with returning nationals by 'welcoming them home'. A greeting such as 'welcome to Britain' for other EU passport holders who are visiting would be appropriate. A smile with a greeting to both groups would be welcome as well!
